title: Microsoft Teams: Front Row layout in Teams Rooms on Android
description: Additional functionality with the Front Row experience, a layout for hybrid meetings that enables users to see remote, attendees at eye level and on dual screens. Users can see Chat in the right panel and participants with raised hands on the left panel. And, Meeting Chat is added to the Gallery, Large Gallery, and Together Mode layout. Front Row layout available in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro and legacy Standard and Premium licenses.
